narrative.title: Brescia Division - 1940Q4
narrative.situation: Italian Autotrasportabile Infantry Division (Binary) deployed in North Africa during 1940Q4.
narrative.objectives: Coastal defense operations west of Tripoli, reserve formation for potential Western Desert operations during Operation Compass
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Desert-adapted with specialized vehicles (SPA AS.37 Sahariano)
Limited mechanization compared to full motorized divisions
Positioned for potential deployment to support 10th Army if needed
